Talk2016:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You go on ahead to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
We're going to rest here a while.
Talk2017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>And have a meal! I can't travel on an
empty stomach!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Gerudo Town is a sacred place! I told
you, voe may not enter without express
permission, and that's final!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>All right. We tried. Perhaps it's time to
give up and go somewhere else.
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The weather's a little overcast right now,
so they're hard to see. But it should clear
up sooner or later.
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We used to be solo travelers too, until
we ran into each other on the road.<sp:0:4:0>The big lump's got no sense of direction
at all. Would you believe he forgot the
way to <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>, his hometown?
I couldn't bear to watch him flail around,
so now we're travel buddies.
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>I didn't forget the way! The way changed!
How was I s'posed to know the lava would
cool like that?<sp:0:4:0>It used to be scorching hot, crisscrossing
the mountain...
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Hahaha, all right, you win. I'll stop, since
I can't cook to save my life.<sp:0:4:0>That's why we're such good traveling
buddies. We make up for each other's
weaknesses.
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry for nattering on. The sight of
you traveling alone just made me a
bit nostalgic.<sp:0:4:0>We're thinking of going to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
in the Necluda region next. That's in
the east.
This guy's dying to see the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Course I am! The ruins' ring-like shape is
one of a kind!<sp:0:4:0>I can't WAIT to taste them! <sp:5:1:0>I...mean chew
them! <sp:5:1:0>I mean...
Talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionSurprise>We've talked about this! Priceless ruins
are for seeing, not eating!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway, <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> is where
we're headed.
Talk_02: <sp:3:0:2:0900>Why? Why won't you let us in?!
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We're thinking of going to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
in the Necluda region next. That's to
the east.
This guy's dying to see the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>As I have said, males aren't allowed here!
Give up! Go back where you came from!
Talk4011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Happy to be of service.


Using <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff> as a landmark is all
well and good, of course.

But the <clr:0000>red haze <clr:ffff>around the summit looks
worryingly like gloom.

Try not to get too close.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>My buddy told me you let him in! How
come he could go in and we can't?
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>No way! I'm not givin' up!<sp:0:4:0>My friend told me he got in! If we keep
asking, they'll let us in too!
Talk4012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right—<sp:5:0:0>let's get going, then! Might as
well get out of this rain.

And on our way, we'll stop by that bistro
place you keep mentioning.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:QuestionNormal_01>What? That is a lie! Your voe friend did
NOT get in!<sp:0:4:0>There's only one voe with permission to
enter this town.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseM>Aren't you the traveler we met on the
way to Kakariko Village?
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Those two are testing my patience.<sp:5:0:0>
I'm so busy with them, I've had no time
to decorate my weapons.
But I'm fine. Who I worry about is Merina.
She can't stand voe, and these ones are
especially annoying.
If she gets any madder, it'll turn into a
scuffle, and I do not want to be around
for that...
Talk2006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oof, I'm hungry... You SURE I can't have
a taste of the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>? A little nibble?
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Now those two have set up a tent in front
of the gate. <sp:5:0:0>The audacity!<sp:0:4:0>I'm so busy keeping an eye on them that
I have no time to decorate any weapons.<sp:0:4:0>But I'm fine. Who I worry about is Merina.
She can't stand voe, and these ones are
especially annoying.
If she gets any madder, it'll turn into a
scuffle, and I do not want to be around
for that...
Talk2007:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionSurprise_01>A little nibble of rare, otherworldly ruins?
<sp:5:0:0>I don't think so, Kairo.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Those two are troublemakers. <sp:5:0:0>I had been
hoping to go off duty for the first time in
ages and decorate my favorite weapon.
Talk2009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry. Pretend you didn't hear all that.<sp:0:4:0>We're well-behaved travelers. We'd never
dream of sullying the places we visit.
Near_08: Darn rain. I can hardly see!
Talk1020: <sp:3:0:2:0801>We're off. See you on the road!
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You're right. I'm being harsh. The way to
<clr:0000>Goron City <clr:ffff>is very complicated now.<sp:0:4:0>It's not as if you can find it by simply
heading toward <clr:0000>Death Mountain <clr:ffff>in the
northeast.
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>That's it! If you keep makin' fun of me,
I won't cook anymore!
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, I recognize you from Lookout
Landing! You traveling alone, brother?
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Kakariko Village is right over there next
to that <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>And the ring-shaped rock to the left of it
is probably one of the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>If you get turned around on the journey,
you can look at those two things to
reorient yourself.
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>We met you at Lookout Landing! Good to
see a familiar face.
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>They're harder to see in the rain. But that
should clear up sooner or later.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Favoritism? That voe is special!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>You're lucky you are dealing with me and
not Merina over there. She'd have carved
you to pieces by now.
Talk4001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>You're a Goron. You should know the way
to <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>.

How in the name of Hylia did you forget?
Talk2010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, you're that traveler we saw at the
stable. You going to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> too?
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Oh, it's you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>I've just about had it with Kairo's
stubbornness. Now he's set up a tent
to camp out by the gate.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>By all accounts, the place is off-limits
to males. I doubt they'll decide to bend
the rules for us.
How you got permission to enter, I can
only imagine.
Talk4002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Lay off! I'm embarrassed enough as it is!<sp:0:4:0>Besides, it's not that I forgot. When I left
the city, there was still lava everywhere.<sp:0:4:0>I didn't know <clr:0000>Death Mountain <clr:ffff>would stop
erupting, the lava would cool, and <clr:0000>new
roads <clr:ffff>would form!
Talk2011:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's on top of that hill. <sp:5:0:0>Hard to see
through the rain, but I promise it's there.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So it's true what folks say—males really
are barred from Gerudo Town.<sp:0:4:0>But you've been there, right? I'd love to
hear what it was like sometime.
Talk4003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>You don't have to tell me there was
lava everywhere.<sp:0:4:0>It used to be so hot that Hylians couldn't
step foot on the mountain without
fire-resistant gear.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Even if I wanted to take a trip that way,
I couldn't.
Talk2012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm starving. If I take one more step, I'll
collapse from hunger!
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>My friend told me he got into
Gerudo Town.<sp:0:4:0>He said there were lots of heavenly
smells—which means there are tasty
things to eat!
<snd:QuestionNormal>You've been there, right? How? What was
your secret?<sp:0:4:0>Persistence, right? You didn't give up,
so I won't either!
Talk4004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Well, thanks to this guy, now ya can!<sp:0:4:0>First, we have to walk down the road
toward <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>, which you can
see over in the northeast.
Then we'll arrive at <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff>,
and from there, we keep goin' north.

Thanks again for the directions, fella!
Talk2013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh_00>Yeesh, so dramatic.<sp:0:4:0>I guess we'll stop here and have
something to eat.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>How come you and my friend were
allowed into Gerudo Town?<sp:0:4:0>I can't stop wondering what's in there!
Talk4005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right—let's go!<sp:0:4:0>And on our way, we'll stop by that bistro
place you keep mentioning.
Talk2014:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm starving. If I take one more step, I'll
collapse from hunger!
